name: Colosseum (itch) (SaxOps1, Garnet)
description:
Enter the Colosseum! Fight your friends! Slap them with fish!

A 1v1 arena fighting game, with some silly twists!

Warning: Very WIP - more fish to come!

Please note that the character sprite rotations are broken, but the 3D model of the fish indicates which direction they are actually facing.

Playtest Feedback Survey: https://forms.gle/HV2jcvhLG9Uk1tnf6

Join a Game:
  1. Find just 1 friend
  2. Select "Play"
  3. Think of a unique 5 letter Room Key, and type it in
  4. Press Enter on your keyboard or click "Join Game" to join the game
  5. Tell your friend your Room Key, and have them follow the same instructions to join
  6. Slap your friend with your fish!

When you hit your friend, they should flash red! And when they run out of health, their character should turn black (meaning you win).

Controls: InputActionWASDMoveLeft ClickAttackLeft ShiftSprintSpaceJumpMouseLookEscapeOpen Menu

Created as a student project for UTS 31103 Game Design Studio 2.
